ComicInfo.Title: The March of the Hare
ComicInfo.Summary:
No longer the hunted, Calie and Violet become the hunters as they travel to New Orleans in search of the infestations of Wonderland. There, they uncover a string of disappearances connected to one of their old enemies, the March Hare. But what does this denizen of Wonderland want with the men and women he's collecting?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ian Richardson & Sanju Nivangune | 1 | B | Cover B | Noah Salonga & Wes Hartman | 3 | C | Cover C | Franchesco! | 4 | D | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | 2 | E | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
